label: 涅槃
本: Sand and Pebbles: The Tales of Mujû Ichien, A Voice for Pluralism in Kamakura Buddhism . State University of New York Press . 1985
説明文: The extinction of all karma (gō, q. v.), which is the cause of transmigration (rinne) through the Six Paths (rokudō, q. v.), conceived either literally or metaphorically. Release from illusion; enlightenment. See also mujō entry (3). [業、輪廻、六道、無常]
